words_block_list.words: in which K and L are equilibrium constants for the binding of cGMP

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: to a subunit and the allosteric transition, respectively; [cG] is the

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: cGMP concentration;x is the fold effect of modification of each

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: C481 on L; and p is the probability of modifying a single C481 that

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: follows a single exponential function of exposure time to modifica-

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: tion reagent. Because the activation of CNG channels generally

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: shows a Hill slope of 2 for activation by cGMP, only two binding

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: steps and two modification steps were modeled, though models

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: with four modification steps would yield similar fitting results.

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: Fluorescence Quenching

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: Quenching by iodide or thallium ion involves a collisional quenching

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: mechanism that can be described by the modified Stern-Volmer

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: equation:

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans
Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans
Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: in which F and F₀ are fluorescence intensity with and without

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: quencher, respectively;Kₐ is the quenching constant; and [Q] is the

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: concentration of the quencher (Lehrer,1971;Lakowicz,1999). The

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: steady-state fluorescence signal from the patch is modeled as from

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: two fluorophore populations, those attached to C481 in the channel

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: and those bound nonspecifically to the membrane. Fluorescent

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: quenching can be described as:

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans
Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans
Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: in which K₄₁ and K₄₂are quenching constants for channel-attached

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: fluorophores and nonspecifically bound fluorophores, respectively;

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: and f is the fraction of fluorophores on the channels. K₉₂ was deter-

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: mined by fluorescence quenching of uninjected oocytes or oocytes

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: expressing cysteineless channels. The quenching constant in so-

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: lution was measured by diluting Alexa488 to a final concentration

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: of 0.4 μM into solutions containing various concentrations of

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: quencher. Fluorescence intensity was then measured with a fluo-

style.font-family: Noto Sans SC,Noto Sans CJK SC,Noto Sans

words_block_list.words: rometer.
